ThingDef.label: Cosmic Catalyst Fuel Cell
ThingDef.description:
WARNING: Explosive Superhazard.

The Cosmic Catalyst Fuel Cell is a small cylinder filled with a reactant for drawing power.

Depending on what it is made of, it can either be filled with Uranium and sunsteel or just pure Cosmic Matter.

The Cosmic Catalyst Fuel Cell's reaction is safe unless a cell's containment is breached, which would cause the full uncontrolled release of all its energy and a followingly violent explosion.
tldr; If it's destroyed, often by nearby explosions, it will explode violently.

The Catalyst Fuel Cell is not vulnerable to fire; it does not combust.

An explosion can be supermassive if a fully fueled Cosmic Reactor is destroyed by something that also destroys the Catalyst Fuel Cells, like a high-damage explosion. Best keep it somewhere nice and away from mortar fire.
